00030 /**
00031  * Abstract class for the flexform fields
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 abstract class tx_oop_Flexform_Field
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The type of the field
00042      */
00043     protected $_fieldType  = '';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * The name of the field
00047      */
00048     protected $_name       = '';
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * The name of the sheet
00052      */
00053     protected $_sheetName  = '';
00054     
00055     /**
00056      * The file with the language labels
00057      */
00058     protected $_langFile   = '';
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * The properties of the field
00062      */
00063     protected $_properties = array();
00064     
00065     /**
00066      * The properties of config section of the field
00067      */
00068     protected $_config     = array();
00069     
00070     /**
00071      * Class constructor
00072      * 
00073      * @param   string  The name of the field
00074      * @param   string  The name of the sheet
00075      * @param   string  The reference of the file with the labels for the flexform (typically: EXT:extkey/path/to/lang/file)
00076      * @return  NULL
00077      */
00078     public function __construct( $name, $sheetName, $langFile )
00079     {
00080         $this->_name      = ( string )$name;
00081         $this->_sheetName = ( string )$sheetName;
00082         $this->_langFile  = ( string )$langFile;
00083         
00084         // Field can be excluded by default
00085         $this->_properties[ 'exclude' ] = true;
00086         
00087         // Field label
00088         $this->_properties[ 'label' ]   = 'LLL:'
00089                                         . $this->_langFile
00090                                         . ':'
00091                                         . $this->_sheetName
00092                                         . '.'
00093                                         . $this->_name;
00094     }
00095     
00096     /**
00097      * 
00098      */
00099     public function __get( $name )
00100     {
00101         switch( ( string )$name ) {
00102             
00103             case 'label':
00104             case 'exclude':
00105             case 'l10n_mode':
00106             case 'l10n_display':
00107             case 'l10n_cat':
00108             case 'displayCond':
00109             case 'defaultExtras':
00110                 
00111                 return ( isset( $this->_properties[ $name ] ) ) ? $this->_properties[ $name ] : false;
00112                 break;
00113                 
00114             default:
00115                 
00116                 return ( isset( $this->_config[ $name ] ) ) ? $this->_config[ $name ] : false;
00117                 break;
00118         }
00119     }
00120     
00121     /**
00122      * 
00123      */
00124     public function __set( $name, $value )
00125     {
00126         switch( ( string )$name ) {
00127             
00128             case 'label':
00129             case 'exclude':
00130             case 'l10n_mode':
00131             case 'l10n_display':
00132             case 'l10n_cat':
00133             case 'displayCond':
00134             case 'defaultExtras':
00135                 
00136                 $this->_properties[ $name ] = ( string )$value;
00137                 break;
00138                 
00139             default:
00140                 
00141                 $this->_config[ $name ] = $value;
00142                 break;
00143         }
00144     }
00145     
00146     /**
00147      * 
00148      */
00149     public function __isset( $name )
00150     {
00151         switch( ( string )$name ) {
00152             
00153             case 'label':
00154             case 'exclude':
00155             case 'l10n_mode':
00156             case 'l10n_display':
00157             case 'l10n_cat':
00158             case 'displayCond':
00159             case 'defaultExtras':
00160                 
00161                 return isset( $this->_properties[ $name ] );
00162                 
00163             default:
00164                 
00165                 return isset( $this->_config[ $name ] );
00166                 break;
00167         }
00168     }
00169     
00170     /**
00171      * 
00172      */
00173     public function __unset( $name )
00174     {
00175         switch( ( string )$name ) {
00176             
00177             case 'label':
00178             case 'exclude':
00179             case 'l10n_mode':
00180             case 'l10n_display':
00181             case 'l10n_cat':
00182             case 'displayCond':
00183             case 'defaultExtras':
00184                 
00185                 unset( $this->_properties[ $name ] );
00186                 
00187             default:
00188                 
00189                 unset( $this->_config[ $name ] );
00190                 break;
00191         }
00192     }
00193     
00194     /**
00195      * 
00196      */
00197     protected function _writeConfigObject( array $configSection, SimpleXMLElement $xml )
00198     {
00199         foreach( $configSection as $key => $value ) {
00200             
00201             if( is_array( $value ) ) {
00202                 
00203                 if( is_int( $key ) ) {
00204                     
00205                     $child            = $xml->addChild( 'numIndex' );
00206                     $child[ 'index' ] = $key;
00207                     
00208                 } else {
00209                     
00210                     $child = $xml->addChild( $key );
00211                 }
00212                 
00213                 $child[ 'type' ] = 'array';
00214                 
00215                 $this->_writeConfigObject( $value, $child );
00216                 
00217             } else {
00218                 
00219                 if( is_int( $key ) ) {
00220                     
00221                     $xml->numIndex[ $key ]            = $value;
00222                     $xml->numIndex[ $key ][ 'index' ] = $key;
00223                     
00224                 } else {
00225                     
00226                     $xml->$key = $value;
00227                 }
00228             }
00229         }
00230     }
00231     
00232     /**
00233      * 
00234      */
00235     public function addFieldXmlObject( SimpleXMLElement $el )
00236     {
00237         $name  = $this->_name;
00238         
00239         foreach( $this->_properties as $key => $value ) {
00240             
00241             $el->$name->TCEforms->$key = $value;
00242         }
00243         
00244         $el->$name->TCEforms->config->type = $this->_fieldType;
00245         
00246         $this->_writeConfigObject(
00247             $this->_config,
00248             $el->$name->TCEforms->config
00249         );
00250     }
00251 }
